 boolean DrawableImage.findChipHighlight(CellId rackLocation, HitPoint highlight, int squareWidth, int squareHeight, int e_x, int e_y, double sscale)
          do highlight detection for DrawableImage.drawChip(java.awt.Graphics, online.common.exCanvas, int, int, int, java.lang.String) and drawStack This uses DrawableImage.pointInsideCell(online.common.HitPoint, int, int, int, int) to determine if the point is inside, and calls DrawableImage.registerChipHit(online.common.CellId, online.common.HitPoint, int, int, int, int) to mark the hit in the highlight object.

          considering only points with a square of squareSize around x,y, accumulate points into pt, eventually leaving hitObject as the closest cell this is intended to locate the closest point in a dense grid when the point of interest is somewhere near the grid.

 boolean cell.findChipHighlight(HitPoint highlight, int squareWidth, int squareHeight, int e_x, int e_y)
          do highlight detection for cell.drawChip(java.awt.Graphics, online.common.exCanvas, online.game.chip, int, int, int, java.lang.String) and drawStack This uses cell.pointInsideCell(online.common.HitPoint, int, int, int, int) to determine if the point is inside, and calls cell.registerChipHit(online.common.HitPoint, int, int, int, int) to mark the hit in the highlight object.
